select u.user_id AS userId, u.login_name AS loginName, u.`name`, u.phone_number AS phoneNumber, u.work_code AS workCode, u.create_user_id AS createUserId, u.create_time AS createTime, o.org_cname AS orgName, u.sex AS sex, u.brithday AS birthday, u.email AS email, u.org_id AS orgId, u.brithday AS birthday, u.status, d.depart_cname AS departCName, e.enumName AS statusName from cw_ge_user u left join cw_ge_organization o on u.org_id = o.org_id left join cw_ge_department d on u.depart_id = d.depart_id left join cw_ge_user_role_ref urr on u.user_id = urr.user_id left join cw_ge_role gr on urr.role_id = gr.role_id left join cw_base_enum e on u.status = e.enumValue and e.enumType = "ENABLED_STATUS"
and u.org_id = #{orgId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and u.login_name like CONCAT('%', #{loginName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and u.work_code like CONCAT('%', #{workCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and u.name like CONCAT('%', #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and u.phone_number like CONCAT('%', #{phoneNumber, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
and u.status = #{status, jdbcType=INTEGER}
and u.status in(0, 1)
and (gr.role_cname like CONCAT('%', #{roleName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') or gr.role_ename like CONCAT('%', #{roleName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') )
